feed: <col=00C100>Server Tip@bla@: Accidently leveled a skill? Right click it in your skills tab
to reset it!
<col=00C100>Server Tip@bla@: Want to chat or need some help? Join '@red@Help Chat@bla@' Clan.
<col=00C100>Server Tip@bla@: Grand Exchange is available through any bank booth! Simply
right click any bank booth and select 'Grand-Exchange'.
<col=00C100>Server Tip@bla@: Tired of restocking over and over again? Press F9, F11 or F12
to set preset setups!
<col=00C100>Server Tip@bla@: Have the same Slayer task as a friend? Try slaying near each
other and you will receive their kills and experience!
<col=00C100>Server Tip@bla@: Need better armor? Try out barrows for a high chance of
obtaining better gear!
<col=00C100>Server Tip@bla@: Thieving Stalls located near home are a good way to earn cash
when you first start out!
Need urgent help? Type ::help to request assistance from staff members!
Remember to register on our forums: @red@Runique.org@bla@ or type ::forums for all
of the latest updates on Runique!
Remember to vote every 12 hours by typing ::vote for a reward of cash,
vote points and a mystery box!
Bored? Go and pk for pk points which you can spend in the pk point store!
You can type ::edge to get there without the hassle of running!
You current get double zeals from playing Soul Wars!
